Hello there,

Suresh Koya wrote:
> How can I have a mix of older style (Pre Junit 4.0 Tests) and new
> style (with annotations) tests in one class. When I run them, it
> seems to be running only the old style tests. I was able to run all
> of them only by removing "extends TestCase" and using "@Test"
> annotation for everything. Is the the only way or are there other
> ways.

As far as I know you can't mix old- and newstyle test in ONE class and I
don't think that makes any sense anyways. But you can combine old- and
newstyle tests in one JUnit 4 Testsuite.

Greetings,
   Malte
